message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it has immense value, and I'm confident it will be a great asset for you. My initial asking price is $1,400,000. I'm open to discussing this further, and I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I believe this product has great value, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me halfway and consider a price of $1,200,000?
